https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5JrLI9UvAh47oatszbZdyaOoA5h.jpg Former punk rocker Jonen, now a Buddhist priest, seems to have lost the meaning of his life. His manic depression handicaps him further. Music seems to be the only solution for him to exorcise his demons, against all obstacles and sound volume controllers. Abraxas
